items.title: Senate eyes key vote on Trump’s tax bill, while Musk calls it ‘utterly insane and destructive’
items.description: Not all GOP lawmakers are on board with proposals to reduce spending on Medicaid, food stamps and other programs to help cover the cost of tax cuts.

items.title: Two workers for SEC’s EDGAR system charged with insider trading
items.description: Prosecutors alleged they pocketed $1 million by stealing non-public information obtained through their jobs.

items.title: A shadow Fed chief could lead to a ‘revolt’ on the FOMC against Powell’s successor, former vice chair warns
items.description: "If he or she contradicts what Powell is saying, that will aggravate the FOMC, almost all of whose members will still be there when the new chair take...

items.title: Chief Justice Roberts warns against elected officials’ heated political words about judges
items.description: Without identifying anyone by name, Roberts clearly referenced Republican President Donald Trump and Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer.

items.title: Falling home prices are raising the risk of a deeper correction as the housing market cracks under high mortgage rates
items.description: The latest Case-Shiller home price report showed a 0.3% monthly fall in the 20-city index in April, steeper than March's downwardly revised 0.2% dip.
